vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Levi living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at 1Ch.23.10;
son of: Shimei (H8096);
brother of: Jahath (H3189I), Jeush (H3266J) and Beriah (H1283J); also called Zizah at 1Ch.23.11;
Another name of zi.na (זִינָא "Zina" H2126)
§ Zizah = "abundance"
a Gershonite Levite, second son of Shimei; also called 'Zina'
vocabInfos._es_Definition: descendiente de Guersón; tribu de Leví
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
細撒 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "豐富"
一位革順的利未人, 示每的第二個兒子; 又稱作 細拿 [2126] (代上23:11)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
细撒 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "丰富"
一位革顺的利未人, 示每的第二个儿子; 又称作 细拿 [2126] (代上23:11)
